notes: Spell Lifesteal of multiple Voodoo Masks does not stack.
Heals from any spell damage the owner deals (with a few exceptions) against enemy or allied units.
Does not heal from damage done against buildings, wards or self.
Heals from all three damage types and from many instantly killing effects.
Heals from damage dealt after all reductions.
In order for it to heal, the damage source must be the owner. Damage done by its summons (including wards) does not heal.
abilities.description: 10% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type. Lifesteal reduced to 2% against creeps.

name: Voodoo Mask
description: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.
tips: This item is amazing for survival if your hero's damage output mostly consists of area of effect or damage over time abilities.
